channel.title: Start gathering useful feedback from your users in seconds
channel.description:
Hi, I'm Jon! I'm a founder of FeedBaxley, which is intended for collecting feedback from your users, and.. we'd like your feedback! What sucks? What's holding you back from signing up?
feedbaxley .com
Here's our marketing blurb. Would love feedback on that too :slight_smile:
Talk to your users to figure out what's frustrating before they churn or even discover that next feature that'll help you break into new markets.
‚ö°Ô∏èIncredibly easy to set up, copy & paste
üé® Customize to match your brand.
üí¨ View feedback in Slack
